title: Relativity, Cosmology, and Modern Physics

vocab.definition: Einstein's theory describing space and time at high speeds
Einstein's theory describing gravity as curvature of spacetime
Scientific model explaining origin and evolution of universe
Invisible matter that doesn't emit light but has gravitational effects
Region of spacetime where gravity prevents escape of light

teachingNotes: Introduce modern physics concepts through observable phenomena. Use analogies to help students understand abstract concepts.

sample.question: What theory describes space and time at high speeds?

truefalse.question: General relativity describes gravity as curvature of spacetime.

multiplechoice.question: What scientific model explains the origin of the universe?

fillintheblank.question: A region where gravity prevents light escape is a ________ hole.

shortanswer.question: What evidence supports the Big Bang theory?
